title: Tatty toy

properties.name: description
properties.value: The tatty toy is a toy that resembles a bear. It can be found at the second floor of the Lumbridge general store in the north-west corner. It probably belongs to Abigaila, as the examine text of the bear mentions Suro, the name of Abigaila's drowned son.

content:
This article is about the bear in the Lumbridge general store. For the bear used in the Dig site quest, see Teddy.
Tatty toy
Released7 June 2018 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestNo
LocationAbove Lumbridge general store
OptionsNone
ExamineLooks like it's got the name 'Suro' stitched onto it.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID32986

The tatty toy is a toy that resembles a bear. It can be found at the second floor of the Lumbridge general store in the north-west corner. It probably belongs to Abigaila, as the examine text of the bear mentions Suro, the name of Abigaila's drowned son.

Although the toy looks like an item that can be picked up, it is actually a piece of scenery that is disguised as such. Therefore, it can only be examined.

Although Abigaila only exists in member's worlds, her tatty bear also exists in free to play worlds.

The '''tatty toy''' is a toy that resembles a bear. It can be found at the second floor of the [[Lumbridge]] general store in the north-west corner. It probably belongs to [[Abigaila]], as the examine text of the bear mentions ''Suro'', the name of Abigaila's drowned son. 

Although the toy looks like an item that can be picked up, it is actually a piece of scenery that is disguised as such. Therefore, it can only be [[examine|examined]].

Although Abigaila only exists in member's worlds, her tatty bear also exists in free to play worlds.
